amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for the Missouri River Ecosystem Recovery Program (MRERP).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to continue the study conducted by the Army Corps of Engineers pursuant to section 5018(a)(1) of the Water Resources Development Act of 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Luetkemeyer.
